name: mcp-client-llm-project
description: Cliente MCP con LLM para frontend developers

scripts.build:server: tsc server/server.ts --outDir server/build --target es2022 --module esnext --moduleResolution bundler
scripts.build:client: tsc src/client.ts --outDir build --target es2022 --module esnext --moduleResolution bundler
scripts.build:all: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.dev:server: npm run build:server && npm run start:server
scripts.dev:client: npm run build:client && npm run start:client
scripts.dev: npm run build:all && echo 'Servidor y cliente compilados. Ejecuta en terminales separadas: npm run start:server y npm run start:client'
scripts.test: npm run build:all && echo 'Testing MCP client...' && npm run start:client

author: Anderson Romero
